name: In Boxes
description:
Game-A-Week 2023 game number 3.

In Boxes is a 15-minute narrative about helping a friend pack before they move away.

This week's focus was creating a dialogue system. I way overthought the art for the npc in this game, and didn't do much other art (I am not an artist). The resulting game is simpler than I'd hoped, but I'm happy with it.

Next week we'll do some bookkeeping!

CONTROLS

Z - Interact/Confirm

X - Cancel/Jump

C - Menu

Arrow Keys - Move
